name: The Richard Pryor 4-Movie Collection: Which Way Is Up? / Brewster's Millions / Car Wash / Bustin' Loose (Widescreen)

reviews.name: The Richard Pryor 4-Movie Collection: Which Way Is Up? / Brewster's Millions / Car Wash / Bustin' Loose (Widescreen)
reviews.reviewText: the funniest comedian that ever hit the stage, this item is a GREAT buy. You get 4 movies all for the price of one, BUSTIN LOOSE, WHICH WAY IS UP, CARWASH. AND the other one (cant remember) was not one of my top 3 but the package is STEAL-A-DEAL for the 4 movies included
reviews.title: RICHARD PRYOR IS THE BEST

reviews.name: The Richard Pryor 4-Movie Collection: Which Way Is Up? / Brewster's Millions / Car Wash / Bustin' Loose (Widescreen)
reviews.reviewText: This great because they have put some of Richard Pryor's greatest movies together. you can't beat the price either.
reviews.title: A gut buster from beginning to end.

reviews.name: The Richard Pryor 4-Movie Collection: Which Way Is Up? / Brewster's Millions / Car Wash / Bustin' Loose (Widescreen)
reviews.reviewText: love all the movies from Richard Pryor. Bought one for my aunt.
reviews.title: 23 March 2012

reviews.name: The Richard Pryor 4-Movie Collection: Which Way Is Up? / Brewster's Millions / Car Wash / Bustin' Loose (Widescreen)
